sentences.english: This is not, however, a piece about crime and punishment.
sentences.chinese: 这，然而，不只是关于罪与罚。

sentences.english: Then one of the judges of the city stood forth and said, "Speak to us of Crime and Punishment."
sentences.chinese: 城中的一位法官趋前言道，请给我们讲讲罪与罚。

sentences.english: Crime and punishment grow out of one stem.
